MakePivotTable module¶

Note: Currently, this module is not used in the TADA program

Update from V2.1 : output method upgraded to xlsxwriter, doing ‘format as table’ for PowerBI Update from V2.2 : remove duplicated run ids, add unit for criterias.

MakePivotTable.main()¶
MakePivotTable.pivot_table(wb: object, ws1: object, pt_ws: object, ws_name: str, pt_name: str, pt_rows: list, pt_cols: list, pt_filters: list, pt_fields: list)¶

This function creates a pivot table in the excel file

Parameters

  • wb (object) – workbook1 reference

  • ws1 (object) – worksheet1

  • pt_ws (object) – pivot table worksheet number

  • ws_name (str) – pivot table worksheet name

  • pt_name (str) – name given to pivot table

  • pt_rows (list) – values selected for filling the pivot tables

  • pt_cols (list) – values selected for filling the pivot tables

  • pt_filters (list) – values selected for filling the pivot tables

  • pt_fields (list) – values selected for filling the pivot tables

MakePivotTable.run_excel(filename, sheet_name: str)¶
